amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the Department of Defense to assist any group or individual not part of a country's armed forces for the purpose of assisting that group or individual in carrying out military activities in or against Libya.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 201 (Roll no. 513).
